page.title: 14BASILDON NE: BEAT OFFICERS
page.content:
Basildon has 18 neighbourhood areas, each patrolled by a male or female {Neighbourhood Beat Officer,}or{NBO.
NBOs usually patrol singly on foot, but have the use of bicycles, cars or vans if needed. They aim to get to know those residing in their area, and promote the image of the police by putting forward a fair and sensible attitude. They try to make their area a better place to live by getting the public involved as a community.
Many NBOs visit primary schools to give talks or films about road safety, the dangers of talking to strangers, and safety in general. They have the power to deal with children's wrongdoings in a sympathetic manner.
